milestones.title: Project Planning and Design
milestones.description: Site survey and analysis, Meetings with stakeholders and community members, Development of initial design concepts, Finalization of design including plant species selection, layout of educational exhibits and recreational areas
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Securing Permissions and Procurement
milestones.description: Securing necessary permits and approvals, Procurement of plants, materials, and equipment, Hiring of contractors and workers
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Site Preparation and Initial Planting
milestones.description: Site clearance and preparation, Soil conditioning and preparation, Initial planting of trees and shrubs
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Construction of Recreational Areas and Educational Exhibits
milestones.description: Construction of recreational areas including seating, playgrounds, and picnic areas, Installation of educational exhibits, Continuation of planting scheme
milestones.paymentDetails: : 25% of total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Completion of Planting and Finishing Touches
milestones.description: Completion of planting scheme, Installation of signage and lighting, Final touches to recreational areas and exhibits
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Final Inspection and Project Handover
milestones.description: Final inspection and snagging, Rectification of any issues identified, Formal handover to the city
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of total project cost upon completion of this milestone
